Blank theme

Source: R/SCP-plot.R
theme_blank.Rd

Blank theme

Usage

theme_blank(
  add_coord = TRUE,
  xlen_npc = 0.15,
  ylen_npc = 0.15,
  xlab = "",
  ylab = "",
  lab_size = 12,
  ...
)

Arguments

add_coord

Whether to add coordinate arrows. Default is TRUE.

xlen_npc

The length of the x-axis arrow in "npc".

ylen_npc

The length of the y-axis arrow in "npc".

xlab

x-axis label.

ylab

y-axis label.

lab_size

Label size.

...

Arguments passed to the theme.

Examples

library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, colour = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point()
p + theme_blank()

p + theme_blank(xlab = "x-axis", ylab = "y-axis", lab_size = 16)
